item.title: Cycle Touring the BC Coast
item.description: With a few spare days between finishing work and starting a masters program at UBC I was keen to experience some adventure before going back to school.

item.title: Cycling Across Canada
item.description: During my first year of university my friend Cory and I began to plan a cycling trip across Canada.
